name: bnn
description:
bnn

============================================================

by Nomi and Scott Polhemus

June 2015

bnn is an interactive short film made in Unity 5. It was created as a part of The Magpie Collection, a charity campaign to support indie game developers who lost their properties.

In other words, we were robbed...

But, we're hoping it wasn't a human, so it must've been a giant magpie. We've put together some creative bits & bobs to help buy back what was lost. We appreciate your patronage & hope you're keen on all this good stuff.

WHO MADE THIS?

------------

Nomi (Director): A doer. A walking thinker. An Instant-Film maker. Currently based in Berlin.

@the_nomi | http://www.thenomi.org

Scott Polhemus (Writer/Voice): A writer. A wronger. A laughmonger. Currently based in New York.

@PaulHemus | www.cargocollective.com/polhemus

Together they are Pancho Nero…

@pancho_nero

[Follow us on Facebook!]

Mr. Luca (Coder in Chief): Mr. Luca is an awesome Luca whose last name is extraordinarily complicated. He helped Nomi build bnn. Without him, bnn couldn't have been made.

@MrLucaGames

Special Thanks: Filippo Tarpini for the initial inspiration, Xanto Nemot for his opinions as an experienced banana consumer, and Yuji Nomi for some technical advice on the audio track.

REQUIREMENTS

------------

Mac OS X 10.7+ and you beautiful non-magpie.

HOW?

-------------

Download.

Open.

Watch.

Follow (very simple) directions.

The End.
